name: Angel Problems
description: Everyone thinks that paradise is a free place where everyone does what he wants, but ... This is a delusion ... In paradise, all the Angels are forced to kill demons, help people, protect the gates and destroy the demons. ... Without rest, without sleep ... Angels have become very few, and demons have become even more ... And this means that you need to get rid of them even faster, before they have time to grow even more. Less time, more work ...
